name: Scott Losse
bio: Scott Losse is a stand-up comedian from Seattle, Washington. He is married and has two chihuahuas. Scott has performed at SF Sketchfest, Bumbershoot: Seattle’s Music & Arts Festival, Sketchfest Seattle, and lots of other places that aren’t festivals. Comedy Clubs. Colleges. Bars. Dive Bars. Elks Lodges. Regular Lodges. Scott recently appeared on Laughs on FOX. You have never heard of him.
